msbt.message: You know me SO well. The gift you gave me is SO ME! Sometimes I stay up all night just looking at it. HA! Just kidding. You know I need my beauty rest. But I really do like it, and I'm not just saying that.
Yo, that birthday gift you gave me? It's like something I'd give myself. Yep, it was that good. It's almost weird that you could know exactly what I wanted... Wait. Have you been spying on me?!
I'm flabbergasted. You got me the exact gift I was going to buy for myself. Like, I was ready to go buy it and everything! Well, I hope you like this gift even a hundredth as much as I liked yours.
Every time I look at the birthday present you got me, I think about you. Not in a weird way. Just in the totally normal way that friends think about each other. Anyway, I got you something too.

I just wanted to write you and let you know how much I appreciate the birthday gift you got me. It's so cool you took the time to pick that out for me! I hope you find this little gift almost as cool.

Hey, just writing to say thanks for that excellent birthday gift! It was like a nonfat caramel mocha latte with extra whip and sprinkles for my soul. I hope what I got you makes you feel the same way!
